title: Strengthening Social Problem-Solving Competencies through VR-Based Embodied Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners progress flexibly using their own VR devices, with project-based assessments evaluating real-life problem-solving abilities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze spatial and contextual elements of social issues in 3D through embodied learning in a VR environment
Learners can interpret social issues from diverse stakeholder perspectives through role-playing using VR simulations
Learners can propose concrete solutions to social problems based on VR embodied learning experiences through project-based assessments

resources: VR Headsets (HTC Vive, Oculus Quest, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
